scripts.db:migrate: sh -c 'read -p "Migration Name: " NAME && npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --name "$NAME"'
scripts.db:migrate:up: sh -c 'read -p "Enter Environment (dev/prd): " ENV && NODE_ENV=$ENV npx sequelize-cli db:migrate'
scripts.db:migrate:down: sh -c 'read -p "Enter Environment (dev/prd): " ENV && NODE_ENV=$ENV npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo'
